description: Try our easy to follow Classic Cheeseburgers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Classic Cheeseburgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the mince, grated carrot, sauce and herbs in a large bowl. Using your hands, mix ingredients together well until evenly combined. Divide mixture into 4 portions and shape into patties 10cm in diameter.

Heat oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat. Add patties and onion to pan and cook burgers for 3 minutes each side or until golden and cooked through. Remove burgers from heat and place on a plate. Top each patty with a slice of cheese. Cover and set aside. Continue cooking onion until browned.
Arrange lettuce, patty and tomato on each roll. Add onions and tomato or barbecue sauce, if desired.
